document_data.title: Primal Power
document_data.author: [[Mike Mearls]], [[Rob Heinsoo]], [[Logan Bonner]], and [[Robert J. Schwalb]]
document_data.mainbody:
{{quote|'''''New options for barbarians, druids, shamans, and wardens.'''

''Take a walk on the wild side! This must-have book in the line of player-friendly game supplements offers hundreds of new options for D&D characters, specifically focusing on heroes who draw power from the spirits that preserve and sustain the world.''}}

This book provides new archetypal builds for [[barbarians]], [[druids]], [[shaman]]s, and [[warden (class)|wardens]], including new character powers, feats, [[:Category:Paragon paths|paragon paths]], and epic destinies.
